text: Hedyosmum purpurascens is a species of plant in the Chloranthaceae family. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. ==References== * Romero-Saltos, H. & Pitman, N. 2004. Hedyosmum purpurascens. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Flora of Ecuador purpureascens Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hedyosmum purpurascens
